#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	string s;
	int i,re=0;
	cin>>s;
	for(i=0;i<5;i++)
	{
		re+=(s[i]-'0')*(s[i+5]-'0');
	}
	cout<<re<<endl;
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
